arag.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
arag.comment: Sum of particulate aragonite components (e.g. Phytoplankton, Detrital, etc.)

bacc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
bacc.comment: Sum of bacterial carbon component concentrations

bfe.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
bfe.comment: Sum of particulate organic iron component concentrations
bfe.long_name: Mole Concentration of Particulate Organic Matter Expressed as Iron in Sea Water

bsi.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
bsi.comment: Sum of particulate silica component concentrations
bsi.long_name: Mole Concentration of Particulate Organic Matter Expressed as Silicon in Sea Water

calc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
calc.comment: Sum of particulate calcite component concentrations (e.g. Phytoplankton, Detrital, etc.)

chl.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
chl.comment: Sum of chlorophyll from all phytoplankton group concentrations.  In most models this is equal to chldiat+chlmisc, that is the sum of Diatom Chlorophyll Mass Concentration and Other Phytoplankton Chlorophyll Mass Concentration
chl.long_name: Mass Concentration of Total Phytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

chlcalc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
chlcalc.comment: chlorophyll concentration from the calcite-producing phytoplankton component alone
chlcalc.long_name: Mass Concentration of Calcareous Phytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

chldiat.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
chldiat.comment: Chlorophyll from diatom phytoplankton component concentration alone
chldiat.long_name: Mass Concentration of Diatoms Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

chldiaz.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
chldiaz.comment: Chlorophyll concentration from the diazotrophic phytoplankton component alone
chldiaz.long_name: Mass Concentration of Diazotrophs Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

chlmisc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
chlmisc.comment: Chlorophyll from additional phytoplankton component concentrations alone
chlmisc.long_name: Mass Concentration of Other Phytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

chlpico.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
chlpico.comment: chlorophyll concentration from the picophytoplankton (<2 um) component alone
chlpico.long_name: Mass Concentration of Picophytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

co3.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
co3.comment: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3).

co3abio.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
co3abio.comment: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the abiotic-analogue carbonate anion (CO3). An abiotic analogue is used to simulate the effect on a modelled variable when biological effects on ocean carbon concentration and alkalinity are ignored.

co3nat.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
co3nat.comment: Surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the natural-analogue carbonate anion (CO3). A natural analogue is used to simulate the effect on a modelled variable of imposing preindustrial atmospheric carbon dioxide concentrations, even when the model as a whole may be subjected to varying forcings.

co3satarag.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
co3satarag.comment: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3) for sea water in equilibrium with pure Aragonite. Aragonite  (CaCO3) is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate.
co3satarag.long_name: Mole Concentration of Carbonate Ion in Equilibrium with Pure Aragonite in Sea Water

co3satcalc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
co3satcalc.comment: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3) for sea water in equilibrium with pure calcite. Aragonite  (CaCO3) is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate.
co3satcalc.long_name: Mole Concentration of Carbonate Ion in Equilibrium with Pure Calcite in Sea Water

detoc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
detoc.comment: Sum of detrital organic carbon component concentrations

dfe.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
dfe.comment: Dissolved iron in sea water,  including both Fe2+ and Fe3+ ions (but not particulate detrital iron)

dissi13c.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean

dissi14c.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean

dissi14cabio.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean

dissic.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean

dissicabio.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean

dissicnat.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
dissicnat.comment: Dissolved inorganic carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration at preindustrial atmospheric xCO2

dissoc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
dissoc.comment: Sum of dissolved carbon component concentrations explicitly represented (i.e. not ~40 uM refractory unless explicit)

dmso.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
dmso.comment: Mole concentration of dimethyl sulphide in water
dmso.long_name: Mole Concentration of Dimethyl Sulphide in Sea Water

exparag.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean

expc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
expc.comment: Downward flux of particulate organic carbon
expc.long_name: Downward Flux of Particulate Organic Carbon

expcalc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean

expfe.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
expfe.comment: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, 'flux' implies per unit area, called 'flux density' in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.

expn.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
expn.comment: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, 'flux' implies per unit area, called 'flux density' in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.

expp.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
expp.comment: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, 'flux' implies per unit area, called 'flux density' in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.

expsi.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
expsi.comment: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, 'flux' implies per unit area, called 'flux density' in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.

graz.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
graz.comment: Total grazing of phytoplankton by zooplankton defined as tendency of moles of carbon per cubic metre.
graz.long_name: Total Grazing of Phytoplankton by Zooplankton

nh4.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
nh4.comment: Mole concentration means moles (amount of substance) per unit volume and is used in the construction mole_concentration_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

no3.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
no3.comment: Mole concentration means moles (amount of substance) per unit volume and is used in the construction mole_concentration_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

o2.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
o2.comment: 'Mole concentration' means number of moles per unit volume, also called 'molarity', and is used in the construction mole_concentration_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox_expressed_as_nitrogen'.

o2sat.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
o2sat.comment: 'Mole concentration at saturation' means the mole concentration in a saturated solution. Mole concentration means number of moles per unit volume, also called 'molarity', and is used in the construction 'mole_concentration_of_X_in_Y', where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox_expressed_as_nitrogen'.

ph.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
ph.comment: negative log of hydrogen ion concentration with the concentration expressed as mol H kg-1.

phabio.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phabio.comment: negative log10 of hydrogen ion concentration with the concentration expressed as mol H kg-1 (abiotic component)..

phnat.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phnat.comment: negative log10 of hydrogen ion concentration with the concentration expressed as mol H kg-1.

phyc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phyc.comment: sum of phytoplankton carbon component concentrations.  In most (all?) cases this is the sum of phycdiat and phycmisc (i.e., 'Diatom Carbon Concentration' and 'Non-Diatom Phytoplankton Carbon Concentration'

phycalc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phycalc.comment: carbon concentration from calcareous (calcite-producing) phytoplankton component alone
phycalc.long_name: Mole Concentration of Calcareous Phytoplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

phydiat.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phydiat.comment: carbon from the diatom phytoplankton component concentration alone
phydiat.long_name: Mole Concentration of Diatoms Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

phydiaz.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phydiaz.comment: carbon concentration from the diazotrophic phytoplankton component alone
phydiaz.long_name: Mole Concentration of Diazotrophs Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

phyfe.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phyfe.comment: sum of phytoplankton iron component concentrations
phyfe.long_name: Mole Concentration of Total Phytoplankton Expressed as Iron in Sea Water

phymisc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phymisc.comment: carbon concentration from additional phytoplankton component alone
phymisc.long_name: Mole Concentration of Miscellaneous Phytoplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

phyn.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phyn.comment: sum of phytoplankton nitrogen component concentrations
phyn.long_name: Mole Concentration of Total Phytoplankton Expressed as Nitrogen in Sea Water

phyp.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phyp.long_name: Mole Concentration of Total Phytoplankton Expressed as Phosphorus in Sea Water

phypico.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
phypico.comment: carbon concentration from the picophytoplankton (<2 um) component alone
phypico.long_name: Mole Concentration of Picophytoplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

physi.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
physi.comment: sum of phytoplankton silica component concentrations
physi.long_name: Mole Concentration of Total Phytoplankton Expressed as Silicon in Sea Water

po4.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
po4.comment: Mole concentration means number of moles per unit volume, also called 'molarity', and is used in the construction 'mole_concentration_of_X_in_Y', where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox_expressed_as_nitrogen'. 'Dissolved inorganic phosphorus' means the sum of all inorganic phosphorus in solution (including phosphate, hydrogen phosphate, dihydrogen phosphate, and phosphoric acid).

pon.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
pon.comment: sum of particulate organic nitrogen component concentrations
pon.long_name: Mole Concentration of Particulate Organic Matter Expressed as Nitrogen in Sea Water

pop.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
pop.comment: sum of particulate organic phosphorus component concentrations
pop.long_name: Mole Concentration of Particulate Organic Matter Expressed as Phosphorus in Sea Water

pp.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
pp.comment: total primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton

ppcalc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
ppcalc.comment: Primary (organic carbon) production by the calcite-producing phytoplankton component alone
ppcalc.long_name: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by Calcareous Phytoplankton

ppdiat.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
ppdiat.comment: Primary (organic carbon) production by the diatom component alone
ppdiat.long_name: Net Primary Organic Carbon Production by Diatoms

ppdiaz.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
ppdiaz.comment: Primary (organic carbon) production by the diazotrophic phytoplankton component alone
ppdiaz.long_name: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by Diazotrophs

ppmisc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
ppmisc.comment: Primary (organic carbon) production by other phytoplankton components alone
ppmisc.long_name: Net Primary Organic Carbon Production by Other Phytoplankton

pppico.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
pppico.comment: Primary (organic carbon) production by the picophytoplankton (<2 um) component alone
pppico.long_name: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by Picophytoplankton

si.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
si.comment: Mole concentration means number of moles per unit volume, also called 'molarity', and is used in the construction 'mole_concentration_of_X_in_Y', where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical or biological species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox_expressed_as_nitrogen'. 'Dissolved inorganic silicon' means the sum of all inorganic silicon in solution (including silicic acid and its first dissociated anion SiO(OH)3-).

talk.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
talk.comment: total alkalinity equivalent concentration (including carbonate, nitrogen, silicate, and borate components)

talknat.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
talknat.comment: total alkalinity equivalent concentration (including carbonate, borate, phosphorus, silicon, and nitrogen components) at preindustrial atmospheric xCO2

zmeso.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
zmeso.comment: carbon  concentration from mesozooplankton (20-200 um) component alone
zmeso.long_name: Mole Concentration of Mesozooplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

zmicro.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
zmicro.comment: carbon  concentration from the microzooplankton (<20 um) component alone
zmicro.long_name: Mole Concentration of Microzooplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

zmisc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
zmisc.comment: carbon from additional zooplankton component concentrations alone (e.g. Micro, meso).  Since the models all have different numbers of components, this variable has been included to provide a check for intercomparison between models since some phytoplankton groups are supersets.
zmisc.long_name: Mole Concentration of Other Zooplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

zooc.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
zooc.comment: sum of zooplankton carbon component concentrations
